Homepage.title: Irenic Hotel in the Heart of Antalya
Homepage.subtitle: Experience Comfort and the Tranquility of the Mediterranean

infoSection.subtitle: Welcome to IRENIC HOTEL
infoSection.heading: Unique Comfort in Konyaaltı
infoSection.text: An unforgettable holiday experience awaits you at our luxury hotel on Antalya Konyaaltı Beach! This unique location within walking distance to the sea offers the perfect opportunity for the most enjoyable vacation of your life.

first.title: Deluxe Single Room
first.text: Compact 10 m² Deluxe Single Room with one single bed and essential amenities, ideal for solo travelers seeking comfort.

second.title: Jacuzzi Suite
second.text: Luxurious 30 m² Jacuzzi Suite with a double bed, private jacuzzi, and premium amenities for an indulgent experience.

deluxe-room-fr.title: Deluxe Room FR
deluxe-room-fr.description: Spacious 20 m² Deluxe Room featuring a comfortable double bed, an en-suite shower cabin, and modern amenities for a relaxing stay.
deluxe-room-fr.overview:
Room size: 20 m²
Capacity: Max. 2 adults
Bed type: Double bed
Bathroom: Shower cabin
Entry: Electronic key card
deluxe-room-fr.features: Electronic key card, air conditioning, direct-dial telephone, Android TV, minibar, electronic safe, hair dryer, kettle, tea, Wi-Fi, towel set, slippers.
deluxe-room-fr.tourtitle: Discover Our Comfortable and Stylish Rooms
deluxe-room-fr.tourtext: Whether you're traveling alone or with your family, we offer 5 different room options to meet every need. Experience the perfect blend of comfort and style in our rooms and enjoy the best vacation possible.

deluxe-room-tw.title: Deluxe Room TW
deluxe-room-tw.description: Cozy 20 m² Deluxe Room with two single beds, a private shower cabin, and all in-room conveniences for a comfortable stay.

deluxe-room-tw.tourtext: Whether you're traveling alone or with your family, we offer 5 different room options to meet every need. Experience the perfect blend of comfort and style in our rooms and enjoy the best vacation possible.

corner-room.tourtext: Whether you're traveling alone or with your family, we offer 5 different room options to meet every need. Experience the perfect blend of comfort and style in our rooms and enjoy the best vacation possible.

Rooms.heroDescription: Located in the heart of Antalya’s Konyaaltı district, Irenic Hotel offers a refined selection of stylish rooms designed for both business and leisure travelers. Whether you choose a deluxe room, a cozy corner space, or our exclusive Jacuzzi suite, you’ll enjoy comfort, modern amenities, and effortless city access.

RoomCard.deluxeRoomFrDescription: Comfortable double bed with all modern amenities, ideal for couples.
RoomCard.deluxeRoomTwDescription: Twin beds and a cozy atmosphere for friends or solo travelers.
RoomCard.cornerRoomDescription: Spacious corner room with one double and one single bed.
RoomCard.jacuzziSuiteDescription: A luxurious suite with a jacuzzi — perfect for a romantic escape.
RoomCard.deluxeSingleRoomDescription: Ideal for solo travelers. Cozy and fully equipped for comfort.

Footer.tagline: Discover boutique elegance in Konyaaltı, Antalya. Bed & Breakfast concept open year-round.
Footer.address: Liman Neighborhood, Atatürk Boulevard No:265, 07130 Konyaaltı/Antalya, Turkey

Services.subtitle: Our Services
Services.title: What We Offer
Services.descriptionFreeWifi: Fiber internet available in rooms and all open areas.
Services.descriptionOpenSwimmingPool: 15 m² outdoor pool at 160 cm depth; open 08:00–18:00.
Services.titleALaCarteRestaurant: A Delicious Start to the Day
Services.descriptionALaCarteRestaurant: Enjoy our complimentary breakfast between 07:30 and 10:00 for a delicious start to your day.
Services.descriptionLobbyBar: Hot, cold & alcoholic beverages available round-the-clock.
Services.descriptionLaundryService: Third-party laundry; turnaround in one full day (paid).
Services.descriptionAirportTransfer: Paid, third-party transfer service to/from Antalya Airport.

Contact.subtitle: Get In Touch
Contact.title: Drop Us A Line
Contact.addressValue2:
Liman Mh. Atatürk Blv. No:265
07130 Konyaaltı/Antalya, Türkiye
Contact.getInTouchDesc: Have a question or need help with your reservation? Our team is here to assist you.

About.para1: Welcome to Irenic Hotel, a modern boutique hotel located in the heart of Antalya’s vibrant Konyaaltı district. Since our opening in November 2023, we’ve been committed to providing an elegant, comfortable, and memorable stay for both business and leisure travelers.
About.para2: With 59 well-appointed rooms, including exclusive Jacuzzi Suites and spacious Corner Rooms, our hotel is designed for guests who appreciate quality, aesthetics, and convenience. Each room is thoughtfully equipped with contemporary amenities to make your stay as seamless as possible.
About.para3: At Irenic Hotel, we believe that hospitality is more than a service — it’s an experience. Whether you're enjoying your morning coffee in our stylish lobby, relaxing by the outdoor pool, or planning your day with help from our 24/7 team, we aim to deliver warm, personalized service every step of the way.
About.para4: Discover the charm of city living with the comfort of a boutique hotel. Welcome home — welcome to Irenic.

Features.subtitle: A Bit About Us
Features.title: Finest Hotel
Features.text1: Enjoy a complimentary welcome drink as you check into your unforgettable stay.
Features.text2: Take a dip in our refreshing outdoor pool available daily from 08:00 to 18:00.
Features.text3: Start your day with a rich breakfast included in your stay, every morning.

ServicesPage.text1: Outdoor swimming pool, 15 m², 160 cm depth, operating hours 08:00–18:00.
ServicesPage.text3: Hot, cold and alcoholic beverages available. Open 24 hours.
